content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Offshore Pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump (position -11.5, 26.5)

### Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)

### Steam Engine at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Pipe connections to various positions

### Electricity Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Poles (positions -16.5, 18.5; -16.5, 19.5; -16.5, 20.5; -16.5, 21.5; -15.5, 19.5; -15.5, 20.5; -19.5, 22.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### Furnace at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Furnace at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Assembling Machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling Machine (position -21.5, 25.5)

### Pipe Groups
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipe Groups for fluid systems at various positions, including connections between the Offshore Pump, Boiler, and Steam Engine.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the positions of the entities you are trying to connect (e.g., Offshore Pump and Boiler) are within the required distance for pipes to connect. Check for any obstacles or incorrect placements that may prevent the connection.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to missing resources
- When attempting to create items, ensure that you have all required resources in your inventory. Check the recipe requirements and gather missing items before proceeding.
